Translations.Text: Ibyo ni ibigaragaza ko Allah ari ukuri, kandi ko ari we uha ubuzima ibyapfuye, ndetse ko ari weushobora byose
Kandi ko imperuka izaza nta gushidikanya, ndetse ko Allah azazura abari mu mva
No mu bantu hari ujya impaka ku byerekeye Allah nta bumenyi (abifitiye), nta muyoboro ndetse nta n’igitabo kimumurikira (afite)
(Uwo muntu ujya impaka) anaga ijosi (kubera kwibona) kugira ngo ayobye (abantu) inzira ya Allah; azagira ikimwaro ku isi, ndetse no ku munsi w’imperuka tuzamusogongeza ibihano by’umuriro utwika
(Azabwirwa ati) "Ibyo ni ukubera ibyakozwe n’amaboko yawe, kandi mu by’ukuri, Allahntarenganya abagaragu be

Ndetse no mu bantu hari ugaragira Allah ashidikanya. Iyo icyiza kimugezeho aratuza, naho yagerwaho n’ikigeragezo agasubira mu buhakanyi (nyuma y’uko yari yarayobotse); ubwo akaba ahombye (ibyiza byo ku) isi n’imperuka. Icyo ni cyo gihombo kigaragara
Asenga ibitari Allahbitagira icyo bimutwara cyangwa ngo bigire icyo bimumarira. Uko ni ko kuyoba guhambaye (kutagira igaruriro)
Asenga icyo inabi yacyo iri hafi kurusha ineza yacyo, kandi rwose (ibyo bihitiyemo gusenga bitari Allah)ni byo barinzi babi ndetse bikaba n’inshuti mbi
Mu by’ukuri, babandi bemeye bakanakora ibikorwa byiza, Allahazabinjiza mu busitani butembamo imigezi (Ijuru), kuko rwose Allah akora ibyo ashatse

Uwo ariwe wese wibwira ko Allah atazatabara (Intumwa Muhamadi) kuri iyi si ndetse no ku munsi w’imperuka,namanike umugozi ku gisenge maze awushyire mu ijosi, narangiza awuce (yiyahure) maze arebe ko umugambi we ukuraho uburakari bwe
